name: laserDRAW
description:
Your phone is a LASER!!!! Draw in mid-air against the clock while your friends guess the picture. Whats your best score?
This is not a game for "quietly-sitting-in-a-corner" types. You WILL look silly, you WILL look ridiculous and you WILL laugh your socks off with your friends!

MULTIPLAYER MODE
- challenge your friends in real life with a connected, real-time draw off!

PRACTICE MODE
- practice your AR drawing skills solo, it's harder than it looks!

*We love our fans!*

Send us your amazing laser creations, or your not-so-good ones and we may feature your on our social media
Hashtag: #laserdraw
Instagram: @loveshark.io
Twitter: @loveshark_io
Email: hello@loveshark.io
